name: 李春穎
objective: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
schedule:
1.	Tension, Compression, and Shear
2.	Axially Loaded Members
3.	Torsion
4.       Shear Forces and Bending Moments
5.	Stresses in Beams
6.	Analysis of Stress and Strain
7.	Applications of Plane Stress
8.       Deflections of Beams
9.       Statically Indeterminate Beams
scorePolicy:
1. 第1次期中考   30%
2. 第2次期中考   30%
3. 平時出席表現  10%
4. 期末考        30%
materials:
教科書：Mechanics of Materials, by Gere & Goodno, 7th SI edition，Cengage Learning，2009，歐亞書局代理
參考書：Mechanics of Materials, by F.B. Beer, E.R. Johnston, Jr. and J.T. DeWolf, 3rd edition, McGraw-Hill Com., 新月圖書代理
參考書：Mechanics of Materials- An Integrated Learning System, by T.M. Philpot, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2008, 歐亞書局代理
參考書：Mechanics of Materials, by R.C. Hibbeler, 8th edition in SI units, 2011，高立圖書代理
